intro: Guettarda membranacea, commonly known as the silky guettarda, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of South America. It is a small evergreen shrub that typically grows in coastal areas and sandy soils. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are narrow,革质 (leathery), and have a smooth, waxy texture. Guettarda membranacea is valued for its ornamental appeal and is often used in landscaping due to its hardiness and ability to thrive in coastal conditions.
